title: DAY IN MY LIFE AT THE FARM! Part 1

subtasks: Wake up and feed dogs (Delilah and Benelli)
Take puppies out for a walk
Unload and manage vehicles (moving bags of green and cat food)
Check for and interact with baby bunnies
Replace water line pipe and secure it with a cuplink
Address concerns about horses (e.g., broken boards, deworming)
Unload and distribute horse hay (Tifton and peanut hay)
Manage found puppies (unloading, confining, and posting for owners)
Visit local businesses (Home Depot) for garbage bags
Transport collected shavings back to the farm
Distribute shavings and prepare for use
Prepare for and continue farm-related video content
